title: Colorado National Monument: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit          Park Map Take a look at the park map to start your trip planning.         Operating Hours and Seasons Colorado National Monument is open year round.         Directions Located in Western Colorado, the monument neighbors the communities of Fruita and Grand Junction.         Fees and Reservations Entrance fees, passes and permits, find out everything you need to know.         Things to Do Hiking, driving, biking, camping and more!         Things to Know Before You Come Weather, Pets, Accessibility, Tunnels and other details to help you prepare.         Brochures Maps, visitor guides, geology information, bird list and more.         Your Safety Educate yourself to stay safe.
